Bibliographic References: PP, no. 131, pis. 22 b and 27 e; PPSupp, no. 163 (where attributed to Python); PhV2, p. 37, no. 42 (with bibliography to date).
Imagery Description: (a) Phlyax, wearing white tunic and holding situla and torch moving to right and looking back at Dionysos who follows with a kantharos in his right hand and a thyrsus in his left, (b) Bv, with stick and 'skewer of fruit', + A2r, with fillet and stick.
